review:
The Problem was very clearly explained. It was a one roof solution for taking X-Ray, RCT, Cleaning etc. 
Even after treatment, detailed explanation was given as to what was done and What we can foresee next. 
Follow up messages from the Clinic was prompt
Overall, I was satisfied with the treatment.
